projects.title: Random Quote Generator
projects.description: This awesome webpage Generates random quote for daily inspiration along with a vibrant color to boost your mood! Go ahead and interact with the page by clicking the "Show another quote" button or allow the page to choose a quote for you. Which ever option you choose, I guarantee you will feel inspired!

projects.title: Data Pagination & Filtering
projects.description: DOM manipulation to enhance the usability of an existing web page using  'pagination'

projects.title: Interactive Form
projects.description: Using JavaScript to enhance an interactive registration form for a Full Stack conference.

projects.title: Phrase Hunter
projects.description: PHRASE HUNTER, a browser-based, word guessing game built using vanilla JavaScript and Object-Oriented Programming

projects.title: Contact Management System
projects.description: Awesome Startup is a distributed company with remote employees working all over the world. I created a smart way for employees to share contact information with each other through an internal employee directory.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: Using server-side JavaScript to create this portfolio you are currently browsing. This portfolio site showcases the great projects I have built. It contains a modern landing page, an about page where I share contact info, information about... you guessed it, ME! I get to humble brag and show off and detail my most recent work. Enjoy!
